clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Nonoxynol 9 is a surfactant spermicide used for contraception in spermicidal creams jellies foams gel and lubricants It is also used in conjuction with other methods of contraception including condoms cervical caps and diaphragms

contraindications.disease: The major drawback of nonoxynol 9 is its detergent type action on epithelial cells and the normal vaginal flora Detergent type spermicides alter the vaginal flora possibly leading to an increased risk of opportunistic infections These are known to enhance the susceptibility of the epithelium of the lower genital tract to HIV and human papillomavirus infection N 9 can cause vaginal irritation and allergic vaginitis as well as genital irritation in male partners

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Nonoxynol 9 can be decreased when it is combined with Aprepitant
Nonoxynol 9 may increase the thrombogenic activities of Thalidomide
Tranexamic acid may increase the thrombogenic activities of Nonoxynol 9
The metabolism of Nonoxynol 9 can be increased when combined with Lorazepam
